unittitle_ssm: Sofia Sequenzia Papers on Hugo Gellert
abstract_ssm: This collection contains three audio cassette tapes of a 1981 interview by Sofia Sequenzia with muralist and illustrator Hugo Gellert. Sequenzia conducted a three-hour interview with Gellert for a freelance article she published in the National Guardian. The audio recordings of the interview appear to be incomplete and are on 3 tapes numbered 1, 4, and 6. The interview is accompanied by Sequenzia's notes and a handwritten transcript. The collection also includes flyers, programs, and articles from events dedicated to Gellert's life and works.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
subject_ssm: Mural painting and decoration -- United States.
collection_ssm: Sofia Sequenzia Papers on Hugo Gellert
